message:
SYSTEM: Metodolog%C3%ADa-2-MC-ODPs.pdf: Página 5
© A. Gómez Pérez, M.C. Suárez-Figueroa, B. Villazón
5
Ontological Engineering
Types of Ontology Design Patterns
http://ontologydesignpatterns.org/wiki/OPTypes
Presentation ODPs deal with usability and 
readability of ontologies from a user 
perspective
Reasoning ODPs are applications of 
Logical ODPs oriented to obtain certain 
reasoning results, based on the behavior 
implemented in a reasoning engine
speaker: SYSTEM
